name: 2D Shooter (zandergt)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project.

Modifications:

1) Added level 2 with spawners and free area to fight enemies.

2) Added level 3 with a maze like map.

3) Added secrete passages and enemies to level 3.

4) Adjusted enemy fire and death effect and in game music volume.

5) Added lives text to the UI.

Created by Ayman
